short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help in property search on RightMove

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- The extension gives the exact address of the house/flat (if the house/flat has sale history) [Works on Rightmove, other platforms will be added later]
- The Extension helps the user in researching about the area of a house/flat when checking it out on RightMove.
- Extension also lets people quickly see the time taken from certain place using google maps. 
- The extension also shows the post code of the house/flat

In order to research the area around the house/flat you need to sign up for crystal roof.Crystal roof is a platform that gives details of areas in the UK - Crime, Affluence, Pollution, Affluence, Deprivation and many more data points.

--------*---------*--------*---------*--------*---------*--------*---------*--------*---------*--------*---------*
HomeQuick Extension Documentation
Welcome to the HomeQuick extension documentation. This extension enhances your house hunting experience on Rightmove by providing additional features to help you make quick and informed decisions.

1. Get Exact house address of the property
The exact address of the property is shown if the house/flat has sale history
If exact address is found its shown as Exact Address: <address of the house>
If exact address is NOT found its shown as Original Address: <Original address as shown by the website>

2. Get Exact Post code of the house
Quickly copy the exact post code of the house by clicking the "Copy post code" button. This feature makes it easy to save or share the post code for future reference.

3. Open Crystal Roof
The "Open Crystal Roof" feature allows you to find detailed information about the area where the house is located. Simply click on the "Open Crystal Roof" link to access this information.

4. Get Directions
The "Get Directions" feature allows you to find the route and estimated travel time from your current location or any specified address to the house. Follow these steps:

Enter the destination location in the provided input field.
Click on the "Show route" button.
Google Maps will open, displaying the start and end locations along with the estimated travel time.

How to Use the Extension
To use the HomeQuick extension:

1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Navigate to a property listing on Rightmove.
3. Use the features provided by the extension as described above to get additional information and make informed decisions.

Bug Fixes
- Fixed a bug where the information shown by the extension would vanish after clicking on the floor plan or house images within RightMove

We hope you find Home Scout helpful in your house hunting journey. For any questions or support or improvements, please contact us at kanwardeep007007003@gmail.com
